author: Billy Lorusso
title: John Legend And Chrissy Teigen Are Peak Sexy In Their Valentine's Day Video
text:
View this image ›
Rankin / Love Magazine / Via youtube.com You can see how much they love each other in every shot.
ID: 10527781 3. Chrissy spends most of the video lip-synching John’s song “Ordinary People” in a bunch of different seductive outfits. Rankin / Love Magazine / Via youtube.com ID: 10527916 4. And John makes regular appearances to flirt with Chrissy and show the camera exactly what sexy looks like in 2017. Rankin / Love Magazine / Via youtube.com ID: 10527969 5. All in all, it’s exactly the kinda cuteness we need to see this Valentine’s Day! View this image ›
Rankin / Love Magazine / Via youtube.com ID: 10529588 6. Because let’s be real, if any two people can show us how to love in 2017, it’s Chrissy and John. View this image ›
Twitter: @chrissyteigen ID: 10527972 7. Happy Valentine’s Day! View this image ›
